item.title: My First Post
item.description: Om Shri Vigneshwaraya Namaha Om Shri Venkateshwaraya Namaha Om Shri Guru Raghavendraya Namaha

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there! I am Ramesh. I am Identity and Access Management (IAM )Engineer. I will be using this blog to post technical content on IAM and anything I find interesting. DISCLAIMER: All views expressed on this site are my own and do not represent the opinions of any entity whatsoever with which I have been,am now, or will be affiliated.
